name: LinkedIn 2021 Mockup
description:
I've trawled the intarwebs trying to find a decent LinkedIn mockup after they had refreshed their design but to no avail! Feel free to use what I've made â€“ don't forget to leave a shoutout over on Twitter @hellotosamuel if you do use this :)


v1.0

Mostly hardcoded; only the company logo is using a component. Update one logo and the rest are automatically updated as well!
